snippet.title: Pepper's Puzzles Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam at http://store.steampowered.com/app/642650/Peppers_Puzzles/

Pepper's Puzzles is a collection of logic games also known as Picross, Nonogram, Griddlers or Paint by Numbers.
Fill the grids using the numeric hints to unveil beautiful pixel-art illustrations!
